subject:
Re: svn commit: samba r22202 - in
	branches/SAMBA_3_0/source/nsswitch: .
body:
On Thu, Apr 12, 2007 at 08:40:31PM -0700, James Peach wrote:
> >
> >Sort of - if people just pull the plug on their machines (as
> >happens with laptops).
> 
> So how does this make winbindd corrupt its TDB? It's not as though  
> anyone is SIGKILL'ing it ... right?

Well, the equivalent. I'm talking about machines going
down hard. This happens especially with laptops more
than servers/desktops. That's the equivalent of a
kill -9 :-).

Jeremy.
